meeting_request.purpose: Feeling lost and disconnected from the political process
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Christopher, a senior Political Science major. I’ve been doing well academically, but lately I’ve been feeling disillusioned about the state of the country and the political system. I used to be passionate about issues like climate change and inequality, but now I just don’t care anymore. I’m frustrated with the way politics is covered in the media and how politicians are able to manipulate public opinion. I’m worried that I’m losing interest in the system I’m trying to change and I don’t know if I should keep pushing or if I should just give up.
